1.title: Tom Boellstorff

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Anthropologist Tom Boellstorff sees no difference between doing ethnographic research in Indonesia or among the residents of a digital universe like Second Life.

2.title: Jayjay Zifanwe

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: "The backbone of the our university's presence in the virtual world is the art and the film. It keeps things alive at all times!" says Jayjay Zifanwe from the University of Western Australia in Perth.

3.title: Luxembourg 1867

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: "Of course every museum should have something like this" says Pit Vinandy, referring to the virtual reality component at Fort Thüngen Museum and the City Museum of Luxembourg.

4.title: Cheeky Pea

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: The mainstream media likes to point out how "living online" destroys relationships in the "real" world but for one American-Scottish couple the virtual world of Second Life became a facilitator.

5.title: Bento

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: "Our users create content all the time: this world is not bounded, it is not finite!" says Coyot Linden, describing the reason for the sustained success of Second Life amongst digital creatives: in this universe you have the freedom to be and do whatever you want. Project Bento which added over 100 new joints/bones to the standard SL skeleton was such an endeavor, spanning months of intense collaboration between Lindens, residents and the ever busy SL content making contractors - the Moles.

1.title: Kriss Lehmann

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Kriss Lehmann is a successful landscaping artist in the online universe of Second Life. As a wise old Japanese gardener he is ever present in his serene shop situated on a floating island in the virtual ocean.

2.title: Jo Yardley

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Jo Yardley, who is a historical consultant for film, TV and museums has done much more than opting out of microwaves, cell-phone and TV usage: inside the virtual world of Second Life, Yardley rebuilt a Berlin that is long gone.

3.title: Eshi Otawara

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: "Second Life is too beautiful a tool for us to only be used for plain simple reality" says artist and painter Eshi Otwara.

4.title: Fantasy Faire Relay for Life

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: "When you come into this world you presenting the best idea of yourself: there is a liberation that occurs there..." says Zander Greene, one of the organizers of Fantasy Faire in Second Life.

5.title: Engrama

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: "Who says what is real and what is not real?" asks Argentine post-rocker Pupito Helstein about his experience playing in Barcelona one night and in the virtual world of Second Life the next morning.

6.title: Abramelin Wolfe

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Motion capture artist Abramelin Wolfe monetizes his creativity by humanizing our virtual lives -- one fluid movement at a time.

7.title: Rod Humble

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: "I have no idea why it's magic but it is!" says former Linden Lab CEO Rod Humble about the company's core product - the vast digital sandbox known as Second Life which has recently celebrated its 10th anniversary.

8.title: Madpea Games

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Finland based design company MadPea Games is churning out complex immersive adventure games and game-based learning concepts within SecondLife using the platform's vast array of tools to the fullest.

9.title: Elie Spot

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: What career path will you take when your dad makes video games and your mother is a graphics designer? Of course: you most likely become a successful entrepreneur in the virtual universe of Second Life.

10.title: Robin Sojourner

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: "We are taught early on that creativity is reserved for the 'creative types' and that they are special but it just not true: all of us can do this. That is what Second Life provides..."

11.title: Dwarfins

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: "I am in debt to SL for giving me an outlet. Yes, it may not be for people with a short attention span but it is perfect for creative people!"

12.title: Ole Etzel

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: "The screen is my canvas on which I paint in a digital way" says Machinima maker Ole Etzel.

13.title: Creations for Parkinson's

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: "My avatar represents how I truly feel inside" says 86-year old Fran Seranade. And despite her Parkinson's condition she navigates her stunningly dressed digital alter ego with bravura through the immersive universe of Second Life.

14.title: Rose Borchovski

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: "If you are a member of the art world you cannot any longer ignore immersive virtual worlds!" says Rose Borchovski and adds: "In Second Life I have a much wider audience than in a museum!".

15.title: Scottius

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: "Second Life is, contrary to the public perception, not a place where lonely people ignore each other; it is a meeting of minds for creative folks!"

16.title: Feed a Smile

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: "A child in Kenya can eat today because your avatar gave 100 Linden Dollars at this concert!"

17.title: Zachh Barkley

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: "The vision is in the player's hands: it is what you see and what you bring to the world!".

18.title: Paradise Lost

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: "We have forgotten how to play, how to have fun!" says Canary Beck and elaborates on why the Metaverse is the place to do just that: "Second Life is like merging Photoshop with a Holodeck!"

19.title: Virtual Chemistry

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: "The students using the replicated lab in Second Life had better retention of information than the students only using the physical lab!" Wendy Keeney-Kennicutt from Texas A&M University is excited.

20.title: Flokers

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: "Second Life changed my life", says the Italian designer and illustrator flokers: "It allowed me to become the artist I really am and turn my passion into a full-time job."

21.title: Editorial Clarity

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: "Second Life helped me discover what I am good at and what I would like to pursue" says 23-year old Edi Clarity.

22.title: Virtual Health Adventures

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: "Second Life is the perfect place for amputees to overcome emotional trauma by sharing stories and realizing they are not alone!"

23.title: Loz Hyde

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: "In SL you can do whatever you want and that is the empowering thing. If more people knew that, more people would use it!"

24.title: MadameThespian Underhill

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: "Second Life levels the playing field", says actress MadameThespian Underhill who directs the virtual reality theatre troupe Artist Repertory Theatre in SL.

25.title: Oblee

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: "I do not see a conflict between the virtual and the natural world!" says Indie Musician Oblee.

26.title: Absinthe

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

26.plot: "Second Life is so multifaceted that you can't really make a judgement as to whether somebody's activity is more serious than somebody else's!"

27.title: Nylon Pinkney

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

27.plot: "I just like making things and see how other people enjoy them!" summarizes virtual entrepreneur Nylon Pinkney her enthusiasm about her work in Second Life.

28.title: Whiskey Monday

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

28.plot: "The anonymity in this virtual world gave me the bravery to be very very real. I was able to overcome a lot of issues by expressing myself creatively in Second Life!"

29.title: Insilico

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

29.plot: "I was raised in the Native American tradition to never lose my awe of the world" says designer and storyteller Stark Osterham.

30.title: Maylee Oh

episode of.title: The Drax Files World Makers (TV Series 2013– )

30.plot: Paris, France based Maylee Oh makes a living by designing female apparel for avatars who live in the virtual world of Second Life.

imdb.plot outline: Profiles the creative people behind the avatars who move the largest virtual reality world Second Life forward with their passion and persistence that cuts across all generational, ethnic and physical divides.
imdb.title: The Drax Files World Makers
akas: The Drax Files World Makers (United States)
plot: Profiles the creative people behind the avatars who move the largest virtual reality world Second Life forward with their passion and persistence that cuts across all generational, ethnic and physical divides.
